1.Laḥayʿamm bin ʾAbīʾanas Dhū-ʾAlam and ʿAbdʾīl bin Hāniʾum [… …] 2.have led and directed and carried out the hewing of stones and the construction of the tower of Barīm [from] 3.the foundations to the top for his lord, Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān bin Shahr-[by ʿAth-] 4.tar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by ʿAmm Dhū-Yāsirim and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqī[r] 5.and by Ḥawkam and by Dhāt Ṣanatim and by Dhāt Ẓāhirān and by Dhāt Raḥīb- 6.ān [and] by their lord Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān bin Shahr, king of Qatabān.
